mapper.select: select id, user_id, user_name, consignee, province, city, district, address_detail, zip_code, phone, create_time, update_time from weiit_user_address where id=#{id}

select count(case state when 0 then order_id end ) wfkOrder, count(case state when 1 then order_id end ) dfhOrder from weiit_order where 1=1
and state in(1,0)
and date(create_time) >= date(#{startTime})
and date(create_time) <= date(#{endTime})

select sum(ifnull(pay_price,0)) payCount from weiit_order where state not in(-1,0)
and date(create_time) >= date(#{startTime})
and date(create_time) <= date(#{endTime})

select count(*) mcount from weiit_user_logs where 1=1
and date(create_time) >= date(#{startTime})
and date(create_time) <= date(#{endTime})

select DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y%m%d') as months, sum(pay_price) as pay_price from weiit_order where state not in(-1,0)
and date(create_time) >= date(#{startTime})
and date(create_time) <= date(#{endTime})
group by months
select product_id, count, spec_content, item_id, order_id, shop_id from weiit_order_item where order_id=#{order_id}

select oo.order_id, oo.order_num, oo.express_num, oo.user_id, us.wx_open_id, oc.express_name , info.authorizer_id ,info.authorizer_app_id, info.service_type_info , ms.wx_template_id , ( select product_name from weiit_order_item where order_id=oo.order_id order by id asc limit 1 ) product_name from ( select order_id, order_num, express_num, user_id,express_template_id, shop_id from weiit_order where order_id=#{validate_id} ) oo inner JOIN weiit_user us on oo.user_id=us.user_id inner JOIN weiit_weixin_public_info info on oo.shop_id=info.shop_id and us.open_id_type=info.service_type_info inner JOIN weiit_weixin_public_template_msg ms on info.authorizer_id=ms.authorizer_id inner JOIN weiit_weixin_public_template_type tt on ms.template_type_id=tt.template_type_id and ms.state=1 and tt.business_type=#{business_type} left JOIN weiit_shop_express oc on oo.express_template_id = oc.id where 1=1
and oo.shop_id=#{shop_id}
